text:
Need Quinn Richardson for Roll'd campaign. Budget around $6,249, looking for 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Store opening, 1 x Podcast guest, 3 x 3-minute vlog. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $6,249 budget

Need to confirm: exclusivity period
